A 10.0 Perfect DTS encode! 
M 3.0 (Q Tarantino tried to make a tribute to the Clint Eastwood "spaghetti westerns and failed.  I think he should have turned left at Albuquerque [strikethrough] Kill Bill)

And YIFY rips are fine if you want to watch them on your laptop or iTampon (imean iPad) and only have 2 channel headphones.  But dear gawd I DL'ed about half a dozen of his files before I figured it out.  

I think that PB.se should have a protocol that your upload file name should include resolution and audio data
